TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Pop3Capabilities extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Capabilities supported by a POP3 server.
Docs.remarks: Capabilities are read as part of the response to the CAPA command that is issued during the connection and authentication phases of the .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Pop3.Pop3Capabilities Apop = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Pop3.Pop3Capabilities Expire = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The server supports the EXPIRE extension (rfc2449) and defines the expiration policy for messages (see ).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Pop3.Pop3Capabilities LoginDelay = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The server supports the LOGIN-DELAY extension (rfc2449), allowing the server to specify to the client a minimum number of seconds between login attempts (see ).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Pop3.Pop3Capabilities None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The server does not support any additional extensions.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Pop3.Pop3Capabilities Pipelining = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The server supports the PIPELINING extensions (rfc2449), allowing the client to batch multiple requests to the server at at time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Pop3.Pop3Capabilities ResponseCodes = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The server supports the RESP-CODES extension (rfc2449), allowing the server to provide clients with extended information in error responses.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Pop3.Pop3Capabilities Sasl = int32(32)

Docs.summary: The server supports the SASL authentication extension (rfc2449), allowing the client to authenticate using the advertized authentication mechanisms (see ).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Pop3.Pop3Capabilities StartTLS = int32(64)

Docs.summary: The server supports the STLS extension (rfc2595), allowing clients to switch to an encrypted SSL/TLS connection after connecting.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Pop3.Pop3Capabilities Top = int32(128)

Docs.summary: The server supports the TOP command, allowing clients to fetch the headers plus an arbitrary number of lines.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Pop3.Pop3Capabilities UIDL = int32(256)

Docs.summary: The server supports the UIDL command, allowing the client to refer to messages via a UID as opposed to a sequence ID.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Pop3.Pop3Capabilities User = int32(512)

Docs.summary: The server supports the USER authentication command, allowing the client to authenticate via a plain-text username and password command (not recommended unless no other authentication mechanisms exist).
